tatami.pc.util.XML

Class XMLTree.XMLNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.pc.util.XML.XMLTree.XMLNode
  • Enclosing class:
    XMLTree

    public static class XMLTree.XMLNode
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that contains the data corresponding to a node (element) in an XMLTree / XML file. Contains a name, a string / integer value, attributes, and child nodes. Some functions return the node itself, so that chained calls can be used. E.g. new XMLNode(name).setValue("value").addNode("child");
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  XMLTree.XMLNode.NodeIterator
      An iterator that iterates only over the child nodes that have a certain name (specified in constructor).
      static class  XMLTree.XMLNode.XMLAttribute

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()

        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:

      • toStringDepth

        public java.lang.String toStringDepth()
        Returns:
        a String representation of this node's name value, attributes and children (recursive). Each node has one line.

      • toStringDepth

        public java.lang.String toStringDepth(java.lang.String indent)
        Parameters:
        indent - to apply to the output.
        Returns:
        a String representation of this node's name value, attributes and children (recursive). Each node has one line.
